name: Peanut Butter Ice Cream
description: 3 ingredients + NO CHURNING! Make this creamy, sweet and salty peanut butter ice cream recipe in just 5 minutes hands on time!
instructions: In a mixing bowl, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form. Blend in sweetened condensed milk and peanut butter. Pour into loaf pan. Freeze 2+ hours (4+ for full size loaf pan).
